page.title: 02DURHAM AGRICULTURAL COLLEGE
page.content: This estate extends to 197 hectares and is bounded on the south and east by the River Wear. There are many agricultural courses offered,from National Diplomas to part time courses in groundsmanship and sports turf management. The teaching accomodation comprises of seven classrooms,four laboratories and a photographic darkroom.In addition there are three large workshops for the teaching of farm machinary and engineering skills. The residential accomodation includes one hundred single study/bedrooms in four hostel blocks with a kitchen and a small shop. The basic entry requirements to be eligable for a place are four G.C.E 'O' levels.
